common.fileSupport: Supports PDF and images (PNG, JPG, JPEG) up to 5MB

hero.title: Uzbek
hero.description: Transform long texts, images or PDFs into concise, accurate summaries with our AI-powered tool. Save time and extract key information instantly.

summarizer.title: AI Content Summarizer
summarizer.description: Enter text or upload a file to generate a concise summary or analyze image content

textInput.label: Your Text
textInput.placeholder: Paste your text here to summarize...

errors.textTooLong: Text exceeds maximum limit of {{count}} characters
errors.fileTooLarge: Text exceeds maximum limit of {{count}} characters

textSummarization.title: Text Summarization
textSummarization.description: Quickly summarize long articles, documents, and text in Uzbek language.

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis
imageAnalysis.description: Extract and summarize text from images containing Uzbek language content.

pdfProcessing.title: PDF Processing
pdfProcessing.description: Upload PDF documents and get concise summaries of their Uzbek content.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: UzSummarize was created to make information in the Uzbek language more accessible and digestible. We believe in breaking down language barriers and helping people save time while retaining the essential information from lengthy texts, PDFs, and images.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our summarization tool uses advanced natural language processing and image analysis models specifically fine-tuned for the Uzbek language. With our latest features, UzSummarize now supports text, PDF, and image inputs.

input.title: Input
input.description: Accept text, PDFs, or images up to 5MB

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Process structure and context of the content

identify.title: Identify
identify.description: Extract key information with linguistic accuracy

refine.title: Refine
refine.description: Remove redundant content while preserving meaning

pdfSummarization.title: PDF Summarization
pdfSummarization.description: Upload PDF documents and let UzSummarize extract and summarize the content in Uzbek. Perfect for reports, articles, or research papers.

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis
imageAnalysis.description: Upload images containing text or visual information in Uzbek. Our tool analyzes the image, extracts relevant text, and provides a concise summary.

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: Whether you're working with text, a PDF, or an image, UzSummarize ensures the output is a coherent and accurate summary in the Uzbek language.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: UzSummarize is built using cutting-edge technologies including Open AI, React, and TailwindCSS. Our models are continuously improving through machine learning to provide increasingly accurate summaries and image analyses, with a focus on the nuances of the Uzbek language.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.

changelog.title: UzSummarize Changelog
changelog.description: Track our journey as we improve UzSummarize with new features and enhancements. We're constantly working to make information in the Uzbek language more accessible.

voiceAssistant.title: Voice Assistant
voiceAssistant.description: Convert text to speech and speech to text

steps.enterText: Enter your text in the input field
steps.chooseVoice: Choose a voice from the dropdown menu
steps.adjustSpeed: Adjust the speech rate using the slider

steps.viewTranscription: Your transcribed text will appear below

tips.quietEnvironment: Use a quiet environment for better recording quality
tips.adjustSpeed: Adjust speech rate to match your preferred listening speed
tips.tryVoices: Try different voices to find the one that works best for you
tips.copyText: Use the copy button to easily share transcribed text

textToSpeech.title: Text to Speech
textToSpeech.description: Convert your text into natural-sounding speech
